import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; const Register = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", number: "", email: "", password: "", password2: "", }); const { name, number, email, password, password2 } = formData; const onChange = c => setFormData({ ...formData, [c.target.name]: c.target.value }); return (
